entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning except low plus 1 over southwestern sections.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning except low plus 1 over southwestern sections. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
